required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mass Screening With Low-Dose CT for Lung Cancer in Guangzhou
clinical_study.official_title: Mass Screening With Low-Dose CT for Lung Cancer in Guangzhou

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: A single-arm, prospective study to explore the incidence of lung cancer, the high-risk factor of lung cancer, and the cost-effectiveness of early screening of lung cancer in the general population over 40 years old with low-dose computed tomography in Guangzhou, China

primary_outcome.description: The incidence of lung cancer among the overall people in the screening

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of lung cancer among people with high-risk factors
secondary_outcome.description: The incidence of lung cancer among people with high-risk factors

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of lung cancer among people with non-high-risk factors
secondary_outcome.description: The incidence of lung cancer among people with non-high-risk factors

secondary_outcome.measure: High risk factors associated with lung cancer (by questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.description: Every participant has to complete a questionnaire before undergoing an LDCT examination. Univariate analysis and multivariate logistic regression analyses will be performed to determine the high risk factors associated with lung cancer

secondary_outcome.measure: Cost-effectiveness ratio (costs of examinations, diagnoses, and treatments)

intervention.description: The Low-dose computed tomography is conducted according to the guideline suggested by American College of Radiology.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Minimum age of 40 years among the residents in Guangzhou
Exclusion Criteria:
- Persons who had a diagnosis of lung cancer or treatment-related to lung cancer with the past 5 years, had a diagnosis of any other cancer within the past 5 years (except for nonmelanoma skin cancer)
- Had hemoptysis
- Had an unexplained weight loss of more than 6.8 kg in the previous year
- Had a CT scan of chest within the previous year

overall_official.affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University
